name: Into the Eagle's Nest (itch)
description:
A modern remake of an old Atari game, this is a WW2 based game similar to Gauntlet. Infiltrate Hitler's secret mansion and rescue some prisoners. More work may be done on this in the future.

(apologies for the poor Japanese and Russian translations... why are Japanese soldiers in Germany in 1943? I have no idea, but they came with the asset pack, so...)

Note: I'm running this on a Ryzen 7, I haven't tested it on any other specs.
